actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 8347(c), title 5, United States Code.

summary.text: Removes the present provision of law whereby the decisions of the Civil Service Commission concerning matters of disability and dependency status relating to such Commission's administration of its annuities program for Federal employees are final and not subject to review. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8347(c))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 8347(c), title 5, United States Code.
